value.title: How to use Azure Kubernetes Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Developers can drastically simplify how they build and run container-based solutions without deep Kubernetes expertise. In this video, Brendan Burns joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss GA of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).   For more information:  • Quickstart: Deploy an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Monitor Application Insights to make your application logging smarter with Custom Event Tracking. value.title: Prepare your cloud environments using Azure landing zones | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Brian Blanchard joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure landing zones and how you can prepare your destination Azure environment—not only to receive migrating applications, but also to balance agility, governance, and security considerations.  0:00 - Overview 0:38 - What is an Azure landing zone? 5:05

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this episode, Azure CTO Mark Russinovich joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Azure Container Instances (ACI) to host a containerized application. Mark deploys an image processing container in three ways: as a standalone ACI container, as part of a Logic Apps workflow, and as the backend

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 4: Describe general security and network security features
value.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your cloud resources are safe, secure, and trusted.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads that you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure App Service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Choose the best AI service for your needs
value.excerpt: Examine Azure's AI services, and choose the right one for your company.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to evaluate Logic Apps as an automation choice for your organization using criteria for integration, performance, conditionals, and connectors.

value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: Azure provides a scalable, compliant, and enterprise-proven platform for a range of SAP workloads. In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP before deploying SAP solutions in Azure, and look at the different options for deploying SAP in Azure.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of writing and replicating customized data to regions around the world with Azure Cosmos DB global distribution.

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Explore Azure DevOps capabilities and get started setting up your own organization knowing what separates elite performers from low performers.

value.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights
value.excerpt: Get full information and custom telemetry about a web app in Application Insights by installing the Application Insights SDK.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Get familiar with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native, security information and event management (SIEM) service.

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

value.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn best practices for building, hosting, and maintaining a secure repository on GitHub.

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.
